Package jbits.core

Interface Content.Layout<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Content.StaticLayout<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLayout, Array.Layout, Pair.Layout, Primitive.ByteArrayLayout, Primitive.IntLayout, Primitive.ShortLayout
    Enclosing class:
    Content
    public static interface Content.Layout<T>
    Provides a generic mechanism for describing the data layout of a piece of content.
    Author:
    David J. Pearce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Content.Blob insert​(T proxy, Content.Blob blob, int offset)
      Insert a value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob.
      T read​(Content.Blob blob, int offset)
      Read the value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob.
      int sizeOf​(Content.Blob blob, int offset)
      Return the size (in bytes) of this layout instantiation in a given blob.
      Content.Blob write​(T proxy, Content.Blob blob, int offset)
      Update the value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob.

    • Method Detail

      • sizeOf

        int sizeOf​(Content.Blob blob,
           int offset)
        Return the size (in bytes) of this layout instantiation in a given blob.
        Parameters:
        blob - The blob in which this layout is instantiated.
        offset - The starting offset where this layout is instantiated.
        Returns:

      • read

        T read​(Content.Blob blob,
       int offset)
        Read the value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob.
        Parameters:
        blob - The blob containing the instantiation of this layout.
        offset - The offset within the blob where the instantiation of this layout begins.
        Returns:

      • write

        Content.Blob write​(T proxy,
                   Content.Blob blob,
                   int offset)
        Update the value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob. Observe that this overwrites the existing value and does not otherwise affect the blob's size.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The value to be written.
        blob - The blob containing the instantiation of this layout.
        offset - The offset within the blob where the instantiation of this layout begins.
        Returns:

      • insert

        Content.Blob insert​(T proxy,
                    Content.Blob blob,
                    int offset)
        Insert a value representing an instantiation of this layout at a given position in a blob. Observe that this necessarily increases the blob's size.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The value to be written.
        blob - The blob containing the instantiation of this layout.
        offset - The offset within the blob where the instantiation of this layout begins.
        Returns:
